definition: to marry and live with the bride's family (inverting traditional Chinese expectations)
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit

sentences.english: The woman is very fine, the man pours to put a door, home get oneself said calculate.
